atk-abh03a18:2_0: 354. Idāni balakathā nāma hoti. Tattha yesaṁ anuruddhasaṁyutte “imesañca panāhaṁ,
atk-abh03a18:2_1: āvuso, catunnaṁ satipaṭṭhānānaṁ bhāvitattā bahulīkatattā ṭhānañca ṭhānato aṭṭhānañca
atk-abh03a18:2_2: aṭṭhānato yathābhūtaṁ pajānāmī”tiādīni dasasuttāni ayoniso gahetvā “tathāgatabalaṁ
atk-abh03a18:2_3: sāvakasādhāraṇa”nti laddhi, seyyathāpi etarahi andhakānaṁ; te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a18:2_4: laddhiyaṁ ṭhatvā paṭiññā paravādissa. Tathāgatabalañca nāmetaṁ sāvakehi sādhāraṇampi
atk-abh03a18:2_5: atthi asādhāraṇampi sādhāraṇāsādhāraṇampi. Tattha āsavānaṁ khaye ñāṇaṁ sādhāraṇaṁ.
atk-abh03a18:2_6: Indriyaparopariyattiñāṇaṁ asādhāraṇaṁ. Sesaṁ sādhāraṇañca asādhāraṇañca. Ṭhānāṭṭhānādīni
atk-abh03a18:2_7: hi sāvakā padesena jānanti, tathāgatā nippadesena. Iti tāni uddesato sādhāraṇāni,
atk-abh03a18:2_8: na niddesato. Ayaṁ pana avisesena sabbampi sādhāraṇanti āha. Tamenaṁ tato vivecetuṁ
atk-abh03a18:2_9: tathāgatabalaṁ sāvakabalanti puna anuyogo āraddho. Tattha paṭhamapañhe niddesato
atk-abh03a18:2_10: sabbākāravisayataṁ sandhāya paṭikkhipati. Dutiyapañhe uddesato ṭhānāṭṭhānamattādijānanavasena
atk-abh03a18:2_11: paṭijānāti. Taññevātiādipañhesu sabbākārena ninnānākaraṇatāya abhāvena paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a18:2_12: Pubbayogo ca pubbacariyā ca atthato ekaṁ, tathā dhammakkhānañca dhammadesanā ca.
atk-abh03a18:3: Indriyaparopariyattipañhe ekadesena sādhāraṇataṁ sandhāya sāvakavisaye paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a18:4_0: 355. Idāni yasmā uddesato ṭhānāṭṭhānādīni sāvako jānāti, tasmā sāvakassa tathā jānanaṁ
atk-abh03a18:4_1: pakāsetvā tena jānanamattasāmaññena tesaṁ sāvakasādhāraṇattaṁ patiṭṭhāpetuṁ sāvako
atk-abh03a18:4_2: ṭhānāṭṭhānaṁjānātītiādayo paravādipañhā honti. Tattha indriyaparopariyattiñāṇaṁ channaṁ
atk-abh03a18:4_3: asādhāraṇañāṇānaṁ aññataranti na gahitaṁ. Āsavakkhayena vā āsavakkhayanti yaṁ tathāgatassa
atk-abh03a18:4_4: āsavakkhayena saddhiṁ sāvakassa āsavakkhayaṁ paṭicca vattabbaṁ siyā nānākaraṇaṁ,
atk-abh03a18:4_5: taṁ natthi. Vimuttiyā vā vimuttinti padepi eseva nayo. Sesamettha uttānatthameva.
atk-abh03a18:5_0: 356. Idāni yaṁ sakavādinā “āsavānaṁ khaye ñāṇaṁ sādhāraṇa”nti anuññātaṁ, tena saddhiṁ
atk-abh03a18:5_1: saṁsanditvā sesānampi sādhāraṇabhāvaṁ pucchituṁ puna āsavānaṁ khayetiādayo paravādipañhāva
atk-abh03a18:5_2: honti. Tesaṁ vissajjane sakavādinā āsavakkhaye visesābhāvena taṁ ñāṇaṁ sādhāraṇanti
atk-abh03a18:5_3: anuññātaṁ. Itaresupi visesābhāvena sādhāraṇatā paṭikkhittā. Puna ṭhānāṭṭhānādīnaṁ
atk-abh03a18:5_4: āsavakkhayeneva saddhiṁ saṁsanditvā asādhāraṇapucchā paravādisseva. Tattha āsavakkhayañāṇe
atk-abh03a18:5_5: paṭikkhepo, sesesu ca paṭiññā sakavādissa. Tato indriyaparopariyattena saddhiṁ saṁsanditvā
atk-abh03a18:5_6: asādhāraṇapucchā paravādissa. Sā saṅkhipitvā dassitā. Tathāpi indriyaparopariyatte
atk-abh03a18:5_7: paṭiññā, sesesu ca paṭikkhepo sakavādissa. Tato ṭhānāṭṭhānādīhi saddhiṁ saṁsanditvā
atk-abh03a18:5_8: indriyaparopariyattassa sādhāraṇapucchā paravādissa. Sāpi saṅkhipitvāva dassitā.
atk-abh03a18:5_9: Tattha indriyaparopariyatte paṭikkhepo. Sesesu ca paṭiññā sakavādissāti.
atk-abh03a18:8_0: 357. Idāni ariyantikathā nāma hoti. Tattha yesaṁ “na kevalaṁ āsavakkhayañāṇameva
atk-abh03a18:8_1: ariyaṁ, atha kho purimānipi nava balāni ariyāni”cceva laddhi, seyyathāpi etarahi
atk-abh03a18:8_2: andhakānaṁ; te sandhāya ariyanti pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Puna yadi
atk-abh03a18:8_3: taṁ ariyaṁ, maggādīsu tena aññatarena bhavitabbanti maggādivasena pucchā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a18:9_0: Puna suññatārammaṇādivasena pucchā sakavādissa. Tattha dve suññatā – sattasuññatā
atk-abh03a18:9_1: ca saṅkhārasuññatā ca. Sattasuññatā nāma diṭṭhiyā parikappitena sattena suññā pañcakkhandhā.
atk-abh03a18:9_2: Saṅkhārasuññatā nāma sabbasaṅkhārehi suññaṁ vivittaṁ nissaṭaṁ nibbānaṁ. Tattha paravādī
atk-abh03a18:9_3: nibbānārammaṇataṁ sandhāya paṭikkhipati, saṅkhārārammaṇataṁ sandhāya paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a18:9_4: Manasi karotīti puṭṭhopi nibbānameva sandhāya paṭikkhipati, saṅkhāre sandhāya paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a18:9_6: imaṁ nayaṁ gahetvā “dvinnaṁ phassānaṁ dvinnaṁ cittānaṁ samodhānaṁ hotī”ti puṭṭho
atk-abh03a18:9_7: lesokāsaṁ alabhanto paṭikkhipati. Animittāpaṇihitesupi eseva nayo. Sattanimittābhāvato
atk-abh03a18:9_8: hi khandhā animittā. Saṅkhāranimittābhāvato nibbānaṁ. Ekadhammasmimpi āropetvā ṭhapetabbasaṅkhātena
atk-abh03a18:9_9: ca paṇidahitabbaṭṭhena paṇihitasaṅkhaṁ gatena sattapaṇidhinā appaṇihitā khandhā.
atk-abh03a18:9_10: Taṇhāpaṇidhinā taṇhāya vā ārammaṇabhūtena sabbasaṅkhārapaṇidhinā appaṇihitaṁ nibbānaṁ.
atk-abh03a18:9_11: Tasmā idhāpi paṭikkhepo ca paṭiññā ca purimanayeneva veditabbā.
atk-abh03a18:10_0: 358. Tato “yathā satipaṭṭhānādayo lokuttaradhammā ariyā ceva suññatādiārammaṇā ca,
atk-abh03a18:10_1: kiṁ te evaṁ ṭhānāṭṭhānañāṇa”nti anulomapaṭilomapucchā honti. Tattha sabbāpi paṭiññā
atk-abh03a18:10_2: sabbe ca paṭikkhepā paravādisseva. Imināvupāyena sesañāṇesupi pucchāvissajjanaṁ veditabbaṁ.
atk-abh03a18:10_3: Pāḷiyaṁ pana sesāni saṅkhipitvā avasāne cutūpapātañāṇameva vibhattaṁ. Tato paraṁ
atk-abh03a18:10_4: sakasamayepi “ariya”nti siddhena āsavānaṁ khayañāṇena saddhiṁ saṁsanditvā sesañāṇānaṁ
atk-abh03a18:10_5: anulomato ca paṭilomato ca ariyabhāvapucchā honti. Tā sabbā paravādissa, paṭiññā
atk-abh03a18:10_6: paṭikkhepo ca sakavādissa. Te uttānatthāyeva. Pāḷiyaṁ panettha paṭhamanavamāneva
atk-abh03a18:13_0: 363. Idāni vimuttikathā nāma hoti. Tattha yesaṁ “vītarāgacittānaṁ vimuttipayojanaṁ
atk-abh03a18:13_1: nāma natthi. Yathā pana malīnaṁ vatthaṁ dhoviyamānaṁ malā vimuccati, evaṁ sarāgaṁ
atk-abh03a18:13_2: cittaṁ rāgato vimuccatī”ti laddhi, seyyathāpi etarahi andhakānaṁ; te sandhāya sarāganti
atk-abh03a18:13_3: pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Tato rāgasahagatantiādinā nayena puṭṭho maggakkhaṇe
atk-abh03a18:13_4: cittaṁ vimuccati nāma. Tadā ca evarūpaṁ cittaṁ natthīti paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a18:14: Saphassantiādinā nayena puṭṭhopi yathā phasso ca cittañca ubho rāgato vimuccanti, evaṁ rāgassa vimuttiṁ apassamāno paṭikkhipati. Sadosādīsupi imināvupāyena attho veditabbo.
atk-abh03a18:17_0: 366. Idāni vimuccamānakathā nāma hoti. Tattha yesaṁ “jhānena vikkhambhanavimuttiyā
atk-abh03a18:17_1: vimuttaṁ, maggakkhaṇe samucchedavimuttiyā vimuccamānaṁ nāma hotī”ti laddhi, te sandhāya
atk-abh03a18:17_2: vimuttaṁ vimuccamānanti pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarasa.
atk-abh03a18:18_0: Puna ekadesanti pucchā sakavādissa. Tattha ekadesanti bhāvanapuṁsakaṁ. Yathā vimuttaṁ,
atk-abh03a18:18_1: ekadesena vā ekadese vā avimuttaṁ hoti kiṁ evaṁ ekadesaṁ vimuttaṁ, ekadesaṁ avimuttanti
atk-abh03a18:18_2: pucchati. Kiṁ kāraṇā evaṁ pucchatīti? “Vimuttaṁ vimuccamāna”nti vippakatabhāvena
atk-abh03a18:18_3: vuttattā. Yathā hi kariyamānā kaṭādayo vippakatattā ekadesena katā ekadesena akatā
atk-abh03a18:18_4: honti, tathā idampi ekadesaṁ vimuttaṁ ekadesaṁ avimuttanti āpajjati. Tato paravādī
atk-abh03a18:18_5: kaṭādīnaṁ viya cittassa ekadesābhāvā paṭhamapañhe paṭikkhipitvā dutiye vimuccamānassa
atk-abh03a18:18_6: apariniṭṭhitavimuttitāya paṭijānāti. Lokiyajjhānakkhaṇaṁ vā sandhāya paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a18:18_7: Na hi taṁ tadā samucchedavimuttiyā vimuccamānaṁ. Lokuttarajjhānakkhaṇaṁ sandhāya
atk-abh03a18:18_8: paṭijānāti. Tañhi tadā samucchedavimuttiyā vimuttekadesena vimuccamānantissa laddhi.
atk-abh03a18:18_9: Tato sakavādī “yadi te ekameva cittaṁ ekadesaṁ vimuttaṁ ekadesaṁ avimuttaṁ, evaṁ
atk-abh03a18:18_10: sante yo ekeneva cittena sotāpanno hoti, sopi te ekadesaṁ sotāpanno, ekadesaṁ na
atk-abh03a18:18_11: sotāpanno āpajjatī”ti codanatthaṁ ekadesaṁ sotāpannotiādimāha. Itaro taṁ vidhānaṁ
atk-abh03a18:19: Uppādakkhaṇapañhe yadi ekameva cittaṁ vimuttañca vimuccamānañca, ekasmiṁ khaṇe vimuttaṁ ekasmiṁ vimuccamānaṁ āpajjati. Kiṁ te evarūpaṁ cittanti attho.
atk-abh03a18:20_0: 367. Suttasādhane paṭhamasuttaṁ paravādissa. Tatrāssāyamadhippāyo – vimuccatīti vippakataniddeso.
atk-abh03a18:20_1: Tasmā yaṁ tassa yogino evaṁ jānato evaṁ passato etehi āsavehi cittaṁ vimuccati, taṁ
atk-abh03a18:20_2: vimuccamānaṁ nāma hotīti. Dutiyasuttaṁ sakavādissa. Tatrāssāyamadhippāyo – yadi te
atk-abh03a18:20_3: vimuccatīti vacanato vimuttaṁ vimuccamānaṁ, idha vimuccatīti vacanābhāvato vimuttameva
atk-abh03a18:21_0: Idāni “yathā te vippakatavimuttitāya vimuccamānaṁ, kiṁ evaṁ vippakatarāgāditāya rajjamānādīnipi
atk-abh03a18:21_1: atthī”ti codanatthaṁ puna atthi cittantiādi āraddhaṁ. Paravādināpi tathārūpaṁ cittaṁ
atk-abh03a18:21_2: apassantena sabbaṁ paṭikkhittaṁ. Atha naṁ sakavādī “dveyeva koṭiyo, tatiyā natthī”ti
atk-abh03a18:21_3: anubodhento nanu rattañceva arattañcātiādimāha. Tassattho – nanu bhadramukha, rāgasampayuttaṁ
atk-abh03a18:21_4: cittaṁ rattaṁ vippayuttaṁ arattanti dveva koṭiyo, rajjamānaṁ nāma tatiyā koṭi natthīti?
atk-abh03a18:21_5: Duṭṭhādīsupi eseva nayo. Atha naṁ āmantāti paṭijānitvā ṭhitaṁ. Vimuttipakkhepi dveyeva
atk-abh03a18:21_6: koṭiyo dassetuṁ hañci rattañcevātiādimāha. Tassattho – yadi etā dve koṭiyo sampaṭicchasi,
atk-abh03a18:21_7: avimuttañceva vimuttañcā ti imāpi sampaṭiccha. Kilesasampayuttañhi cittaṁ avimuttaṁ,
atk-abh03a18:21_8: vippayuttaṁ vimuttaṁ. Vimuccamānaṁ nāmāti paramatthato tatiyā koṭi natthīti.
atk-abh03a18:24_0: 368. Idāni aṭṭhamakakathā nāma hoti. Tattha yesaṁ anulomagotrabhumaggakkhaṇe kilesānaṁ
atk-abh03a18:24_1: samudācārābhāvato aṭṭhamakassa sotāpattimaggaṭṭhapuggalassa dve pariyuṭṭhānā pahīnāti
atk-abh03a18:24_2: laddhi, seyyathāpi etarahi andhakānañceva sammitiyānañca; tesaṁ aññataraṁ sandhāya
atk-abh03a18:24_3: pucchā sakavādissa, maggakkhaṇato paṭṭhāya diṭṭhiyā anuppattiṁ sandhāya paṭiññā itarassa.
atk-abh03a18:24_4: Tato yasmā diṭṭhi nāmesā sotāpannasseva pahīnā, na maggaṭṭhassa, tasmā aṭṭhamako
atk-abh03a18:24_5: puggalo sotāpannoti anuyogo sakavādissa. Vicikicchāpañhepi eseva nayo. Anusayapañhe
atk-abh03a18:24_6: pariyuṭṭhānato añño anusayoti tesaṁ laddhi, tasmā “na heva”nti paṭikkhittaṁ.
atk-abh03a18:25: Sīlabbataparāmāsapañhepi sīlabbataparāmāsapariyuṭṭhānanti vohāraṁ na passati, tasmā paṭikkhipati. Pariyuṭṭhānamevassa pahīnanti laddhi.
atk-abh03a18:26_0: 369.Maggo bhāvitoti pañhe tasmiṁ khaṇe bhāveti, na bhāvito. Tasmā paṭikkhipati. Amaggenātiādianuyoge
atk-abh03a18:26_1: paṭhamamaggeneva pahīnabhāvaṁ sandhāya paṭikkhipati. Yadi hi amaggena pahīyetha,
atk-abh03a18:26_2: gotrabhupuggalādīnampi pahīyethāti āpajjanato. Uppajjissatīti pucchā paravādissa,
atk-abh03a18:29_0: 371. Idāni aṭṭhamakassa indriyakathā nāma hoti. Tattha yesaṁ “aṭṭhamako maggakkhaṇe
atk-abh03a18:29_1: indriyāni paṭilabhati nāma, no cassa paṭiladdhāni hontī”ti laddhi, seyyathāpi etarahi
atk-abh03a18:29_2: andhakānaṁ; te sandhāya natthi saddhindriyanti pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa.
atk-abh03a18:29_3: Natthi saddhāti puṭṭho pana saddhindriyato saddhāya nānattaṁ sallakkhetvā paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a18:29_4: Sesesupi eseva nayo. Yathā pana yassa atthi mano, tassa manindriyampi atthi; evaṁ
atk-abh03a18:29_5: yassa saddhādayo atthi, tassa atthi saddhindriyādīnipīti dīpanatthaṁ atthi mano atthi
atk-abh03a18:29_6: manindriyantiādi āraddhaṁ. Taṁ sabbaṁ uttānatthameva saddhiṁ suttasādhanenāti.
atk-abh03a18:32_0: 373. Idāni dibbacakkhukathā nāma hoti. Tattha yesaṁ catutthajjhānadhammūpatthaddhaṁ
atk-abh03a18:32_1: maṁsacakkhumeva dibbacakkhu nāma hotīti laddhi, seyyathāpi etarahi andhakānañceva
atk-abh03a18:32_2: sammitiyānañca; te sandhāya maṁsacakkhunti pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa.
atk-abh03a18:33: Puna “maṁsacakkhu dibbacakkhu, dibbacakkhu maṁsacakkhū”ti puṭṭho taṁ mattameva taṁ na hotīti paṭikkhipati. Yādisantiādipucchāsupi ubhinnaṁ ekasabhāvābhāveneva paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a18:34_0: Visayotiādīsu ubhinnampi rūpāyatanameva visayo. Maṁsacakkhu pana āpāthagatameva passati.
atk-abh03a18:34_1: Itaraṁ anāpāthagataṁ tiropabbatādigatampi. Dibbacakkhussa ca atisukhumampi rūpaṁ
atk-abh03a18:34_2: gocaro, na tādisaṁ itarassāti evametesaṁ ānubhāvagocarā asadisā.
atk-abh03a18:35_0: Upādiṇṇaṁ hutvā anupādiṇṇaṁ hotīti puṭṭho yasmā maṁsacakkhu upādiṇṇaṁ, dibbacakkhu
atk-abh03a18:35_1: anupādiṇṇaṁ, na ca maṁsacakkhumeva dibbacakkhūti icchati, tasmā paṭikkhipati. Dutiyaṁ
atk-abh03a18:35_2: puṭṭho yasmā “maṁsacakkhussa uppādo, maggo dibbassa cakkhuno”ti vacanaṁ nissāya maṁsacakkhupaccayā
atk-abh03a18:35_3: dibbacakkhu uppajjati, tañca rūpāvacarikānaṁ catunnaṁ mahābhūtānaṁ pasādoti icchati,
atk-abh03a18:35_4: tasmā paṭijānāti. Kāmāvacaraṁ hutvāti puṭṭhopi yasmā na maṁsacakkhumeva dibbacakkhūti
atk-abh03a18:35_5: icchati, tasmā paṭikkhipati. Dutiyaṁ puṭṭho rūpāvacarajjhānapaccayena uppannattā
atk-abh03a18:36_0: Rūpāvacaraṁ hutvā arūpāvacaranti puṭṭhopi tato paraṁ bhāvanāya arūpāvacarakkhaṇe
atk-abh03a18:36_1: rūpāvacaracittassa abhāvā paṭikkhipati. Dutiyaṁ puṭṭho arūpāvacarikānaṁ catunnaṁ
atk-abh03a18:36_2: mahābhūtānaṁ pasādo hutvā uppajjatīti laddhiyā paṭijānāti. Apariyāpannabhāvaṁ panassa
atk-abh03a18:37_1: dhammupatthaddhanti lokuttaradhammena upatthaddhaṁ. Dveva cakkhūnīti puṭṭho kiñcāpi
atk-abh03a18:37_2: dibbacakkhuno dhammupatthaddhassa paññācakkhubhāvaṁ na icchati, paññācakkhussa pana
atk-abh03a18:37_3: atthitāya paṭikkhipati. Puna puṭṭho maṁsacakkhu dhammupatthaddhaṁ dibbacakkhu hotīti
atk-abh03a18:40_0: 375. Idāni dibbasotakathā nāma hoti. Tattha ekaṁyeva sotanti puṭṭho dvinnaṁ atthitāya
atk-abh03a18:40_1: paṭikkhipati. Puna puṭṭho yasmā tadeva dhammupatthaddhaṁ dibbasotaṁ nāma hoti, tasmā
atk-abh03a18:43_0: 377. Idāni yathākammūpagatañāṇakathā nāma hoti. Tattha yesaṁ “iti dibbena cakkhunā
atk-abh03a18:43_1: visuddhena…pe… yathākammūpage satte pajānātī”ti suttaṁ ayoniso gahetvā yathākammūpagatañāṇameva
atk-abh03a18:43_2: dibbacakkhunti laddhi, te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Puna yathākammūpagatañca
atk-abh03a18:43_3: manasi karotīti puṭṭho ekacittassa ārammaṇadvayābhāvā paṭikkhipati. Dutiyaṁ puṭṭho
atk-abh03a18:43_4: nānācittavasena paṭijānāti. Puna lesokāsaṁ adatvā dvinnaṁ phassānanti puṭṭho paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a18:43_5: Iti yathā iminā yathākammūpagatapadena, evameva ime vata bhonto, sattātiādipadehipi
atk-abh03a18:44_0: 378.Āyasmāsāriputto yathākammūpagataṁ ñāṇaṁ jānātīti idaṁ sakavādī yasmā thero appicchatāya
atk-abh03a18:44_1: abhiññāñāṇāni na vaḷañjetīti ekacce na jānanti, tāni panassa neva atthīti maññanti,
atk-abh03a18:44_2: tasmā taṁ “dibbacakkhuno alābhī thero”ti maññamānaṁ pucchati. Teneva kāraṇena “atthāyasmato
atk-abh03a18:44_3: sāriputtassa dibbacakkhū”ti parato puṭṭho paṭikkhipati. Dutiyaṁ puṭṭho yaṁkiñci sāvakena
atk-abh03a18:44_4: pattabbaṁ, sabbaṁ taṁ therena anuppattanti paṭijānāti. Idānissa vikkhepaṁ karonto
atk-abh03a18:44_5: sakavādī nanu āyasmā sāriputtotiādimāha. Imañhi gāthaṁ thero vaḷañjanapaṇidhiyā eva
atk-abh03a18:44_6: abhāvena āha, na abhiññāñāṇassa abhāvena. Paravādī pana abhāvenevāti atthaṁ sallakkheti.
atk-abh03a18:44_7: Tasmā tassa laddhiyā therassa yathākammūpagatañāṇameva atthi, no dibbacakkhu. Tena
atk-abh03a18:44_8: vuttaṁ “tena hi na vattabbaṁ yathākammūpagatañāṇaṁ dibbacakkhū”ti.
atk-abh03a18:47_0: 379. Idāni saṁvarakathā nāma hoti. Tattha yesaṁ tāvatiṁse deve upādāya tatuttari
atk-abh03a18:47_1: devesu yasmā te pañca verāni na samācaranti, tasmā saṁvaro atthīti laddhi, te sandhāya
atk-abh03a18:47_2: pucchā sakavādissa, verasamudācāraṁ apassato paṭiññā itarassa. Tato yasmā saṁvaro
atk-abh03a18:47_3: nāma saṁvaritabbe asaṁvare sati hoti, tasmā asaṁvarapucchā sakavādissa, devesu pāṇātipātādīnaṁ
atk-abh03a18:48: Atthi manussesūtiādi saṁvare sati asaṁvarassa asaṁvare ca sati saṁvarassa pavattidassanatthaṁ vuttaṁ.
atk-abh03a18:49: 380.Pāṇātipātā veramaṇīti ādipañhesu pāṇātipātādīnaṁ asamācaraṇavasena paṭiññā, pāṇātipātādīnaṁ natthitāya paṭikkhepo veditabbo. Paṭilomapañhā uttānatthāyeva.
atk-abh03a18:50_0: Avasāne natthi devesu saṁvarotipañhe pāṇātipātādīni katvā puna tato saṁvarābhāvaṁ
atk-abh03a18:50_1: sandhāya paṭiññā sakavādissa. Tato chalavasena yadi saṁvaro natthi, sabbe devā pāṇātipātinotiādipucchā
atk-abh03a18:50_2: paravādissa. Devānaṁ verasamudācārassa abhāvena paṭikkhepo sakavādissa. Nahevanti
atk-abh03a18:50_3: vacanamattaṁ gahetvā laddhipatiṭṭhāpanaṁ paravādissa. Evaṁ patiṭṭhitā pana laddhi
atk-abh03a18:53_0: 381. Idāni asaññakathā nāma hoti. Tattha yesaṁ “saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇa”nti vacanato
atk-abh03a18:53_1: vinā viññāṇena paṭisandhi nāma natthi. “Saññuppādā ca pana te devā tamhā kāyā cavantī”ti
atk-abh03a18:53_2: vacanato asaññasattānampi cutipaṭisandhikkhaṇe saññā atthīti laddhi, seyyathāpi etarahi
atk-abh03a18:53_3: andhakānaṁ; te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Tato naṁ sakavādī “kiṁ
atk-abh03a18:53_4: te taṁ ṭhānaṁ saññābhavo”tiādīhi codetuṁ saññābhavo saññāgatītiādimāha. Taṁ sabbaṁ
atk-abh03a18:56_0: 384. Idāni nevasaññānāsaññāyatanakathā nāma hoti. Tattha yesaṁ “nevasaññānāsaññāyatana”nti
atk-abh03a18:56_1: vacanato na vattabbaṁ “tasmiṁ bhave saññā atthī”ti laddhi, seyyathāpi etarahi andhakānaṁ;
atk-abh03a18:56_2: te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Sesamettha sabbaṁ pāḷinayeneva veditabbanti.
